Jensen JTV1921DC 19″ LED HD TV with Integrated HDTV (ATSC) Tuner, 16:9 LCD Panel, 1366 x 768, 12VDC, 16.7 Million Colors, White LED Illumination, 250 nit Brightness, 9ms Response Time

Jensen made just what you need to upgrade your mobile lounge. This 19″ LED HD TV runs off 12-volt power, giving you a sleek and tidy addition to your boat, RV, custom SUV, or limousine. With plenty of diverse inputs and HD capability, this screen will make the most out of anything you connect to it, whether it’s a Blu-ray player or gaming console. You can wall-mount this monitor, and the built-in speakers will broadcast strong stereo sound. The included remote control lets you control the screen and access the menu

Key Features:
– White LED Illumination
– 16:9 LCD panel, 1366 x 768 FULL HD
– DC Power
– Integrated HDTV (ATSC) Tuner
– Audio Return Channel (ARC) Supported with HDMI
– CEC function with JENSEN CEC-equipped HDMI DVD players
– 16.7 Million Colors

Inputs/Outputs:
– Composite Video Input x 1 (NTSC/PAL compatible)
– Component Video Input x 1 (YPbPr) (Note: Composite/component input shares same I/O)
– Stereo Audio Input x 1
– RF x 1
– USB x 1
– HDMI input x 1
– Selectable (Variable/Fixed) Line Level Audio Output (RCA) x 1
– Digital SPDIF Audio Output (RCA) x 1

Specifications:
– Power System: DC 12 V
– Power Consumption: 20mA stand by/3.17A max
– Maximum Relative Humidity: 85%
– Video / Display System: NTSC/ATSC/PAL
– Video Input Signal (Composite): 1Vp-p @ 75 ohms
– Audio Output: 3W x 2
– Diagonal Size: 18.5″
– Resolution: 1366 x 768
– Brightness: 250 nit
– Contrast Ratio: 3000 : 1
– Display Format: 16:9
– Response Time: 9 ms
– Regulatory Certification(s): FCC
– Overall Dimensions: 17.44″ W x 10.97″ H x 1.84″ D (without stand)
– Product Weight: 5.5 Pounds
DC Power
Audio Return Channel (ARC) Supported with HDMI

Jensen JE1913ACWM Widescreen 19″ Wallmount LCD 100-240V AC Television, specially built for Boats, Yacht, RV Recreational Vehicle, Trailer, Camper, Motor Home etc.
JENSEN…the ONLY Brand of TVs designed, engineered, tested & built exclusively for Over-The-Road Applications.
Enjoy functionality at its best with the JE1913AC. This Flat Panel JENSEN LCD TV boasts all the features you could ask for including an integrated HDTV tuner (1080p, 720p & 480p), 16:9 aspect ratio and high-contrast ratio. Brings home entertainment to the RV and take a quality entertainment experience wherever you go! Mount it on the Wall with a VESA 100mm x 100mm mounting pattern TV Mount. To round out this extensive feature set, the JE1913AC features various inputs and outputs.
Inputs/Outputs

  • Composite video input x 2 (NTSC/PAL)
  • Stereo audio input x 1
  • VGA with 3.5mm audio input x1
  • USB input x 1
  • RF x 1
  • HDMI input x 2
  • Selectable (variable/fixed) line level audio output (RCA) x1
  • IR output
  • SPDIF output
  • Headphone output


Specifications

  • Power System: AC 100-240V, 50/60Hz
  • Power Consumption: 42mA stand by, 2.7A max
  • Operating Temperature Range: -4°F to 149°F -20°C to 65°C
  • Storage Temperature Range: -22°F to 158°F -30°C to 70°C
  • Maximum Relative Humidity: 85%
  • Overall Dimensions: 18.03″ W x 12.08″ H x 2.06″ D
  • Product Weight:11 lbs
  • Regulatory Certification(s): FCC


Performance

  • Video / Display System: NTSC/ATSC/PAL
  • Video Input Signal (Composite): 1Vp-p @ 75 ohms
  • Audio Output: 6W x 2


LCD

  • Diagonal Size: 19″
  • Resolution: 1366 x 768
  • Brightness: 250 nit
  • Contrast Ratio: 1000 : 1
  • View Angles: Top 85°, Bottom 85°, Left 80°, Right 80°
  • Display Format: 16:9
  • Response Time: 3.5 ms

110V AC powered LCD AC Television, specially built for Boats, Yacht, RV Recreational Vehicle, Trailer, Camper, Motor Home etc., White LED illumination, 1366 x 768 full HD, Integrated HDTV (ATSC) tuner (1080p, 720p & 480p)
CEC function with AWM975 or other Jensen CEC-equipped HDMI DVD players (DVD Player Not Included), VESA 100mm x 100mm and 200mm x 400mm mounting pattern, Optional table top stand (STDJE1913) sold separately, Full function wireless remote control included
Convenient front controls, Conformal coated circuit boards, Rugged metal cabinet, Reinforced cabinet structure and mounting points. V-O rated front and rear cabinet materials which meets maximum UL/CUL safety certifications
Composite video input x2 (NTSC/PAL), Stereo audio input x1, VGA with 3.5mm audio input x1, USB input x1, RF x1, HDMI input x2, Selectable (variable/fixed) line level audio output (RCA) x1, IR output x1, SPDIF output x1, Headphone output x1

Product Description

For over 30 years, Supersonic is a manufacturer in Consumer and Mobile Electronics. Success has been derived from our core mission statement: To provide Design, Value and Quality products, which ensure years of ultimate entertainment experience for our consumers.

We strive to offer innovative and quality products that fit into every individual lifestyle. With collaboration from our partners, suppliers and customers, Supersonic is continuously making an effort to satisfy the consumer’s current electronic needs.

SuperSonic LED Widescreen HDTV SERIES

Enjoy stunning picture quality and feel like your right in the middle of the action with this LED HDTV.

SuperSonic HDTV brings you a crisp 1080p picture quality for stunning detail and contrast. The colors projected from the monitor contains a spectrum of vibrant colors. Enjoy your shows almost anywhere! Our TVs are designed to be perfect for any location, such as your kitchen or desk. It is also the perfect size for any RV owner! Our TVs contain HDMI, USB, and AC/DC ports. This feature allows you to freely use your Firestick or similar hardware to browse thousands of channels and apps such as Netflix, Hulu, HBO, Showtime, and more. SuperSonic HDTV is compatible with Amazon Firestick and many others such as video game consoles. Built-in ports makes this a versatile system. With PC inputs our TV’s allows you to use your TV as a computer monitor. The screen size and resolution make for a great PC experience!

What’s in the Box:

Remote ControlAC Power AdapterUser Manual

ENTERTAINMENT: Enjoy your shows almost anywhere! Our TVs are designed to be perfect for any location, such as your kitchen or desk.
HDMI / USB COMPATIBLE: Your TV contains HDMI, USB, and AC ports. This feature allows you to freely use your Firestick or similar hardware to browse thousands of channels and apps such as Netflix, Hulu, HBO, Showtime, and more.
COMPATIBILITY: SuperSonic HDTV is compatible with Amazon Firestick and many others such as video game consoles. Built-in ports makes this a versatile system.
PC INPUT: This feature allows you to use your TV as a computer monitor. The screen size and resolution make for a great PC experience.

Product Description

The CT-2860 delivers stunning light, dark and rich colors with crystal clear, sharp 720p resolution on a 28-inch LED HDTV. There is a TV Stand included.

1 A Perfect Fit 2 Unmatched Support 3 Stunning Audio & Video 4 Enjoy the Action! 5 Multiple Connections

VESA Wall Mount Pattern and TV Dimensions

This TV has a Universal VESA Pattern of 100×100 which is one of the most common patterns, meaning it will fit most TV Wall Mounts that are manufactured.

VESA is a universally known measurement of TV mounts used with most TV companies around the world.A VESA hole pattern is measured in both horizontal and vertical distance between mounting holes.

For example, VESA 100 x 100 means your TV mounting holes are 100mm apart horizontally and 100mm apart vertically.

Specifications

Screen Size 28″ Display Resolution 1366 x 768 TV and Stand (WxHxD) 22.8 x 17.2 x 7.1” TV w/o Stand (WxHxD) 25.5 x 15.4 x 2.8” Viewing Angle 178° x 178° Response Time 8ms Broadcast System NTSC/ATSC/QAM Max Audio Output 2 x 8 W VESA Standard 100 x 100 mm Power Supply AC 100-240V 60Hz Power Consumption <45 W Weight 10.3 lbs. USB File Play Allows guests to play MP3 and view JPG files, as well as charge mobile devices

VESA WALL MOUNT READY – The compact, lightweight design makes it quick and easy to mount on your wall. The VESA pattern on this TV is 100×100 which is one of the most common VESA patterns, meaning it will easily fit with most wall mounts you can purchase today. You can also check out our full range of wall mounts by visiting our store.
STUNNING VIDEO AND AUDIO – Enjoy your favorite movies, shows and sports on the 28 inch, 720p, 60Hz LED Television screen which delivers stunning light, dark and rich colors. Pairing with the clarity of the screen is the stunning audio through our state-of-the-art, built-in speakers. Entertainment at the touch of a button!
FULL FUNCTION REMOTE – Control your Television on one simple-to-use remote control. Batteries Included. Easily programmable to any universal remote you may have.
UNMATCHED CUSTOMER SERVICE – Backed by the Continu.us 1 year warranty, our friendly technical support team is always here to help you. Our offices are in the USA in Eastern Time, and you can reach out to us through phone or email.
